amendment.description: Manager's amendment, as modified, makes technical and conforming changes to the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 112-485 to make conforming changes in the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McKeon amendment (A001) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: McKeon amendment (A001) modified by unanimous consent.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McKeon amendment (A001) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. McKeon.
